about_the_game:
The Empty Desk is the first chapter of the Detective Bennett: Solved Cases saga, a psychological thriller that blends adventure, puzzles, and touches of horror to immerse you in a gripping true crime narrative. Explore the effects of a mind trapped in a relentless cycle of repetition and decay. In this first installment, you’ll step into the shoes of veteran homicide detective Thomas H. Bennett, who, just one week away from retirement, faces one last unsettling case that could change him forever.

The story revolves around the mysterious death of magnate Arthur Blackthorn and the unexplained disappearance of his daughter, Emily.

PLAY YOUR WAY

Throughout the chapters, there are certain moments where unexpected scares may appear.

You can play with the scares enabled or without them—it's your choice. If you enjoy the thrill of the unexpected, keep them on. But if you don't like jump scares and prefer to focus on the story, you can disable them for a more immersive experience.

Demo Content:

  • Play through the first three chapters of the game and immerse yourself in the dark mysteries of The Empty Desk.

  • Discover the opening storyline: an unsettling case that will push you to the edge as you meet key characters, each hiding their own secrets and motivations.

  • Explore the core mechanics:

    • Search for hidden clues and piece together the truth step by step.

    • Investigate every corner of the Blackthorn & Co building to uncover buried secrets.

    • Use Detective Bennett’s camera to reveal evidence invisible to the naked eye and unlock new paths.

  • Experience the psychological tension of a detective trapped in a case where reality unravels before your eyes.

  • Immerse yourself in an atmosphere dripping with suspense, critical decisions, and a story that will hook you from the very first moment.

Are you ready to face the horrors hidden behind the walls of Blackthorn & Co?

Download the demo and start uncovering the mystery!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is for mature audiences, featuring themes of crime, death, and psychological distress. It includes depictions of violence, blood, and sensitive topics such as suicide, all within a fictional investigative narrative.

This is a work of fiction. All characters and events are fictional, created for entertainment within the crime investigation genre.
